name: places/ChIJYQdk05ZZwokR0Ip8-bf5JcE
adrFormatAddress: 132 10th Ave, New York, NY 10011-4727, USA

editorialSummary.text: By-appointment-only boutique showcasing unique designer wedding gowns in a chic, brick-lined space.

originalText.text:
Spina carries some of the best designers, and I loved their selection. I visited about 6 months into Covid, so I was only allowed to have two guests with me, and the entire salon had to be booked out for each group. I think in 90-min increments. It felt somewhat rushed and sterile.. definitely not my preferred wedding dress shopping experience, but certainly not Spina's fault!

The one critical thing I will say is: while my sales associate was helpful and informative, to me, she seemed somewhat disinterested/indifferent. My time at Spina wasn't exactly fun/exciting.. it was more "down-to-business." At other salons, the sales teams offered to take photos, help me get creative about ways to customize my final choices, even turn up the music and have me do a catwalk across the store. The experience could have been more fun.

I selected a Liz Martinez dress (custom veil by others). The final fitting and delivery with Spina was smooth enough. After multiple Covid postponements, our Hawaii wedding finally came around, and the dress was absolutely stunning!

originalText.text: As someone going in totally blind to dress shopping, my experience at Spina could not have been better. Kendall made me feel so comfortable and welcome (even though I left still not feeling positive I was ready to make a purchase). I have only visited one other shop, but what I loved about Spina, aside from working with Kendall, was the slippers, the cleanliness, the private try-on rooms, and the ability to walk through the whole boutique and grab styles I liked. I much preferred that experience than just being given a small selection of styles and not getting to browse myself. Spina Bride is top notch, they have an insanely beautiful collection of designers, and it was everything I imagined my shopping experience to be. Thank you Spina Bride for welcoming me in!

originalText.text: Loved and adored my experience at Spina. I visited salons all over NYC and Spina by far had the best selection of wedding dresses and kind staff. I worked with Kendall who was so accommodating when I was running late for my appointment. She was calm, kind, knowledgeable, and set the mood for a fun and relaxing appointment-the salon was STUNNING. I had a private room to try on gowns with my family. Cannot recommend enough. Thank you so much Kendall!!! You are the BEST!!!! So excited to wear my gown!

text.text: Loved and adored my experience at Spina. I visited salons all over NYC and Spina by far had the best selection of wedding dresses and kind staff. I worked with Kendall who was so accommodating when I was running late for my appointment. She was calm, kind, knowledgeable, and set the mood for a fun and relaxing appointment-the salon was STUNNING. I had a private room to try on gowns with my family. Cannot recommend enough. Thank you so much Kendall!!! You are the BEST!!!! So excited to wear my gown!

originalText.text: I had the best experience at Spina bride and Lee Petra Grebenau with Giselle!! They treated me (and still continue) to treat me like royalty! Giselle made me feel so comfortable from day one, even though I’m not the skinniest bride. I had no idea what I wanted, and she quickly guided me to a style I loved. It didn’t take me long to find my dream dress at the LPG location! The processes of getting a dress custom made to your measurements might take longer than the traditional route, but it’s 100% worth it. I couldn’t thank Giselle and the team at Spina/ LPG for being so kind, professional and caring.  I truly felt the most beautiful I’ve ever felt with them! I could not recommend them more!

originalText.text:
I was looking to try Lee Petra Grebenau dresses in NYC which is how I came across Spina Bridal. I had also heard many positive reviews from friends so I was very excited to book my appointment. My bridal consultant was Sarah and she was absolutely fantastic! She's been in the business for many years and truly has such an eye for what silhouette will fit your body. She also had great suggestions for accessories and how the dress could be altered if needed. I was very impressed with her professionalism and guidance throughout the process. I selected a Lee Petra Grebenau dress and was very pleased with the overall experience.
I would highly recommend!
